definition.name: AspectRatio
definition.purpose: Maintain a consistent aspect ratio for its child content
definition.description: A reusable UI component that wraps its children and enforces a specific aspect ratio using Radix UI's AspectRatio primitive. Useful for images, videos, or any content that should maintain a fixed ratio regardless of the container size.

properties.description: All props supported by Radix UI's AspectRatio.Root component

initial.data: No content is rendered until children are provided.

visible: An empty container with a set aspect ratio
enabled: All props passed to the component

when.description: Children are rendered inside the aspect ratio container

visible: Child content is displayed within the enforced aspect ratio

effects: Child content is displayed and scaled to fit the specified aspect ratio

definition.visualLayout: A container that maintains a fixed width-to-height ratio, scaling its children to fit.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI's AspectRatio.Root and forwards all props. Adds a data-slot attribute for styling or testing.
